Summary: I never seen one before it made me believe it came so close.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 5th 1975
divs: Sighting DetailsThe night afther my son deied i was coming from city island ,NY ,with My father and friend in the back seat and my wife in the front with me ,going back to NJ. As I was driving there was a reflection of light on my left but I put no attention to it and keeped driving,My wife got a better look and toled me, Miguel,that is not a plain and there is when I saw it and keeped getting closer on till it got over my car.I saw the bright rectangular windows all around the craft terning clock wise but inside the blinking light were not ,it was on top of my car and I put my head out,started pointing at it so others could see and all the ligths on it turened off and all I could see now was a small red light on top and started moving away till didn't see it no more.I had family in the car behaind os that saw it to.
